name: Dirt Bike Rider Stunt Games 3D
description:
Have you ever dreamed of becoming a bike stunt? Xtreme Moto-cross Dirt Bike Rider Stunt Games 2017 is one of the best game on Appstore which can fulfill you dream. Live life on the edge! Drive your bike through amazing landscapes and perform some amazing stunts!
You can speed up your bike with the nitro and warning is please avoid accidents and try to save your bike from the crash.
Ride your bike with right angle and stunt across the obstacle to reach the destination point. Make sure to collect extreme riding NOS for a crazy ride so you can perform some stunning mid-air trail bike stunts.
Tighten your seat belt and speed through some challenging levels. Each level is more thrilling than the previous level. Perform some serious stunts and race to the finish line really fast! Here is a chance to show the world you are a great biker and one of the bike lovers.
Play this addictive stunt game and perform your stunt riding skills to prove that you are the real trail bike racer. Enjoy impressive graphics and realistic control, which provide you best stunt bike gaming experience.

Game Features:
- Real Sports Bike Collection
- Realistic stunt ramps and stunts
- Ultra Smooth and intelligent control
- High octane racer motorcycle & insane action
- Multiple Realistic physics based dirt bikes
- Most Authentic stunt locations!
- Beautiful 3D graphics and amazing environment
- Challenging stunts game-play
